Hello! And welcome to the Introduction to Kotlin and Android Development by Maximiliano Firtman (firt.dev).

This is a course to start with Kotlin, Jetpack Compose, Android Studio and Android App development published with Frontend Masters.

Requirements

  • You need a computer to install Android Studio available for Linux, macOS and Windows. Android Studio has all the tools we will be using during this workshop.

  • You also need to download the workshop's assets.

Companion websites

  • API and Webapp used in the app
  • Android Studio source code repository
